column5: seven Chinese nationals were expelled from the country by immigration.------They were named as:------1- NI MINGDONG Male.------2- WANG JINLON Male name.------3- NI JIANWEN Male.------4- ZHANG MENG male.------5- NI JIANHE Male.------6-SHAN LIANG Female.------7- XU ZHONG GUI Male------The department chief said that the above suspects were arrested fot telecommunication fraud
column6: and have been banned by the Ministry of Interior  from returnning to the  Kingdom of Cambodia for 3 years.------They left on 3 flights with a total of 22 Chinese security personnel who came to accompany them back to China. ------POST NEWS
